title: Administer the Audit service
content:
This section describes how to administer the Audit service and view the audit log. It also lists the events that trigger the generation of audit log data.

  • How to update the Audit service passwords
  • Configure audit roles and permissions
  • Audit client configuration parameters
  • Configure audit engine
  • Configure audit gateway
  • Change FQDN for audit in a managed Kubernetes environment
  • Change FQDN for audit in an embedded Kubernetes environment
  • View the audit log
  • Audit events

Related topics

Enable audit
